sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: awards have been given to courageous individuals and organizations since 1980. The international organization SOS Mediterranee receives the award for its life-saving humanitarian search and rescue operations in the Mediterranean Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Founded in 2015, SOS Mediterranee has saved up to 40,000 people on the perilous Mediterranean route between North Africa and Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The 2023 Right Livelihood Laureates stand up to save lives, preserve nature, and safeguard the dignity and livelihoods of communities around the world. They bear witness to untold suffering, and they demand a livable future for all.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: With their concrete and courageous work, the Lourdes fight for people's right to health, the right to safety, to a clean environment and to democracy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

sentences.sentence: Switzerland's ice caps are melting at record speeds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Swiss Academy for Natural Sciences says glaciers in the land of milk and honey have shrunk 10% in just two years, approximately 4% in 2023 and 6% in 2022.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: That's the same volume of ice lost between 1960 and 1990.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: So what's causing these glaciers to melt at such an alarming rate?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Scientists say the lack of rain, low snowfall and scorching summer temperatures in recent years are to blame.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: 2,000 metres high in the Alps, more than half of the automated monitoring stations observed new 25-year lows.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Even at altitudes of 3,000 metres, where glaciers are normally stable, experts recorded several metres of snowmelt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Researchers warn that all glaciers in Switzerland and Europe are at risk of disappearing by the end of the century, if global warming continues.
